MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH54 postcode area of Livingston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:13pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to complete further investigations due to a fault on the underground cable network and require our specialist teams to assist with repairs affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:54 PM on Tuesday, 23 March 2021.
